reviewText:
movie was terrific for this genre.
cast was great.

Plenty of t 'n' a.
If you want a great movie look elsewhere, but that being said, it's not the worst movie I've ever seen.
Strangely, the bitrate is fairly high, while the picture quality manages to be half way crappy.
I guess the original print wasn't so great.

This movie is from the mid-1990's and unknown to me, so bought the recently released DVD out of curiosity, pretty sure it would be enjoyable. Though it wasn't that outstanding a film frankly, still enjoyed it because the agile Maria Ford stars in it. I'd not seen her before. She knocked me for six dishing it out to the bad guys drilling plenty with lead (if she ain't karate-chopping them - at one stage near-naked - great stuff!). Her well-executed action scenes alone made it worth watching, and there are quite a few. She looks great in a policewoman-type blue shirt too. (UK customer).

Fans of Maria Ford should enjoy this movie.  She is a policewoman whose sister is killed by a psycho and she decides to get reveng.  Maria works as a bodyguard to a has-been female pop star who dreams of a comeback who is on the psycho's "to kill" list.  Maria and her awesome body are in gorgeous display in two scenes in particular: one where she fights off the bad guys while wearing only panties and another scene where she poses as a stripper.  For a policewoman, she is an awesome stripper!  You get many scenes where Maria wears very sexy, skin-tight outfights while kicking a lot of punk ass!  This is one to watch for Ford fanatics.

Blonde bombshell martial arts expert played by Maria Ford goes out for revenge against a murderous gang of baddies...and wow does she kick some heads in! Maria Ford is perfect for this role and does a believable job combining beauty with deady skill. She deals some pretty explosive beatings out to the bad dudes. The most brutally shocking scene is where she is clad only in her panties and takes on several guys knocking each one out with an array of kicks and martial art strikes. And did I also say she is gorgeous too? Although the plot's weak, overall not a bad flick, especially if you enjoy watching a hot chick bring down crooks using her body as a deadly weapon. Maria Ford knows justice!

This is a great movie because marie ford drop dead gorgeous the plot is thin the action is actually quite well done, Did i mention marie ford is drop dead gorgeuos. Do yourself a favor buy this movie you will be a marie ford fan i have know doubt!
